Title: Relates to sex offenses
Summary: Relates to sex offenses; defines vaginal sexual contact; removes the penetration requirement from the rape statutes.
LawCode: Amd Pen L, generally; amd §§210.16, 390.15 & 60.42, CP L; amd §§347.1 & 344.4, Fam Ct Act; amd §§170 & 200, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the criminal procedure law, the family court act, and the domestic relations law, in relation to sex offenses
